Name: Linear Programming
Description: Maximize a linear objective function subject to linear constraints.

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Maximize or minimize a quadratic objective function subject to linear constraints involving quadratic functions.

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Maximize or minimize a function subject to a set of integer variables.

Name: Nonlinear Programming
Description: Maximize or minimize a function subject to nonlinear constraints and/or objectives.

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Break down a complex problem into smaller
Example: solving each subproblem once and storing its solution.

Name: Genetic Algorithms
Description: Use principles of natural selection to find the optimal solution. Employs a population of candidate solutions that evolve over time.

Name: Simulated Annealing
Description: A metaheuristic optimization algorithm that works by iteratively accepting improvements to a solution and occasionally accepting worse solutions
Solvability: allowing the algorithm to escape local optima.

Name: Constraint Satisfaction Problems
Description: Define a set of variables and constraints that must be satisfied.

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Algorithms that guarantee the optimal solution within a given bound. (The algorithm is convex)

Name: Multi-Objective Optimization
Solvability: aiming to find a compromise between them.
